review: I've enjoyed using this over Chromecast. There was only one initial lag ever since I'ved used it (4 days now). I also like that it's independent from my other devices so that I don't have to worry about flicking it to the screen. The remote wheel was intuitive and it makes typing passwords or text in wayyy less painful! As for the buttons on the actual remote, it feels just the right amount.
